title: teosanru
author: teosanru
created_time: October 06, 2023, 03:33:23 AMLast edit: October 06, 2023, 05:53:39 AM by teosanru
content: Hi India, We all know that Indian community has lagged far behind on this forum, even behind than countries which don't have their local boards, but let's try to accumulate ourselves again and try to grow together. Let's first start with making the list of the members with us. Please post below the post if you are Indian I'll add your name to the directory here, let's try to gather more and more Indians on the forum together and help each other grow.Legendary  WebtricksHeroTeosanruSenior  MemberJunior Member

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Yeah, you are correct we as an Indian community have lagged far behind others. There was a time 2 or 3 years back when our local board was buzzing with a lot of activities. At the moment we are staying afloat with a handful of users. I like your initiative as it will help us to know how many Indians as here in the forum. Please add me to the directory.

comments.author: Bitcoin Smith
comments.body: Include myself, apart from that I can add some names for you to reduce the job for others.Legendary:Heisenberg_Hunter webtricksStedsmTheUltraEliteamishmanisherikaluiavikzHero:pakhitheboss pawanjainlibert19avikzSr.Member:elevatesFull Member:BureaucafterPardon me if I missed anyone, wrote this from mobile.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Smith on October 06, 2023, 06:53:22 AMInclude myself, apart from that I can add some names for you to reduce the job for others.Legendary:amishmanisherikaluiI do not recall seeing them active on the local board or in the forum for quite some time now. amishmanish was active long once or twice but has gone into hibernation . erikalui I do not think I have seen any activities from the user. It is a good initiative by OP, please add me to the directory that you are creating.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: If Bitcoin Smith's list wasn't applicable, I hereby declare myself as active

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on October 10, 2023, 02:57:31 AMIf Bitcoin Smith's list wasn't applicable, I hereby declare myself as active  He might have missed your name.   @Bitcoin Smith please add libert19 under the Hero category.
